CategoryCaption: 2. Category 2: Remunerated employment, office, profession etc
EntrySubject: I receive a small occasional fee for completing general surveys and donate all the money to charities or local voluntary organisations. Very occasionally, I receive payment for appearing on television and radio programmes (S.O. 4.3 - Band 2 – between 5 and 20 hours a week).
All 2021 Senedd election costs paid by Plaid Cymru
Joint ownership of my mother's house with my two brothers in Gwynedd. She lives in the house; I do not derive any financial benefit from this; she pays for all the bills.

I have small shares in the following social enterprises as a practical way of providing support and not for my own profit:

Llety Arall, Caernarfon

Siop Griffiths, Penygroes
